casebody.data:
Norman Alan KERR
v.
CLERK OF SUPERIOR COURT FOR FORSYTH COUNTY No. 206P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Norman Alan Kerr, for Kerr, Norman Alan.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 21st of June 2017 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Forsyth County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of June 2017 by Petitioner to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
